name: Falling Blockz
description:
A classic arcade-style shooter game thats all about reaction time and speed!
My main focus was gameplay, i hope you enjoy playing it as much as i do!

Controls ::

Move (Left and Right) - A & D // Or Left Arrow & Right Arrow
Fire - LMB // Or W // Or Up Arrow
And thats pretty much it controls-wise! for any info about the game, read below.

Info/How to play ::

Its all about reaction time, you gotta be quick because those blocks rain down quick!
A basic game where you shoot falling blocks, but its not that easy.
All music used is royalty-free (free to use, if you don't know), I do not take credit for the great tracks.

Defend yourself from the falling blocks! don't let them hit the ground! If they do you will lose a life! Your goal is to NOT DIE, and get the highest score you can! the game goes on for a bit, then a boss comes out to play! Don't let the boss win!
Shoot Powerups dropped by the blocks to activate them, they will help you live, and help you get a good score! but beware! the Powerups are both good, and bad, depending on which one you got, the more blocks that will come raining down, it makes it a bit more difficult! And once the boss spawns, might wanna be quick!!
he spawns enemies, and shoots at you! dont let the enemies hit the ground as usual, and dont let his bullets hit the player itself! Good luck and have fun!

This game has a highscore system with leaderboards for each game mode that has a high score! Upgrades, Achievements, and more!
